name: Audio Interchange File Format (AIFF)
description: File format for sound that can wrap various sound bitstreams, ranging from uncompressed LPCM waveform to MIDI.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://lehre.hki.uni-koeln.de/kurz/kurz1/planets/fileformats/AIFFSpecs.pdf</field><field name="filenameExtension">aif, aiff, ief</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
